Features.title: Shopping Cart
Features.text: The cart-shopping feature in our e-commerce app is designed to enhance your shopping experience by providing a convenient and efficient way to gather and manage your desired products before making a purchase.

Features.title: Secured Payment
Features.text: Multiple secured payment gateways to ensure safe transactions and protect customers sensible information. SSL encryption and fraud prevention measures for enhanced security and cutomer trust.

Features.title: Customer Reviews And Ratings
Features.text: Customer review system to provide social proof and build trust among potential buyers. Ratings and feedback on products to help customers make informed purchase

Features.title: Easy-to-use Interface
Features.text: Intuitive user interface for seamless navigation and a smooth shopping experience, Simple product search and filtering options to help users find what they are looking for quickly

Services.name: Shipping
Services.title: Provide various shipping options to accommodate different customer needs. This can include standard shipping, express shipping for faster delivery, international shipping for global customers, and options for tracking and insurance.

Services.name: Paypal
Services.title: PayPal is a widely recognized online payment platform that enables individuals and businesses to make and receive payments securely and conveniently.

Services.name: Catalogue
Services.title: This service involves managing and organizing your product inventory. It includes functionalities such as adding new products, updating product information (e.g., descriptions, images, prices), categorizing products into relevant categories, and managing product variations (e.g., sizes, colors).

Services.name: Wishlist
Services.title: Enable users to create and manage wishlists, allowing them to save products for future reference or purchase. This feature helps users keep track of items of interest and improves the overall shopping experience.

Services.name: Users Authentication
Services.title: Enable users to create accounts, log in securely, and manage their personal information. Implement features such as password recovery, email verification, and account settings to enhance user security and privacy.

Services.name: Order Management
Services.title: Implement an order management system to handle the lifecycle of orders. This includes features like order tracking, order history, managing order statuses (e.g., processing, shipped, delivered), and generating invoices.
